question.title: How to load properties from spring cloud config server with quarkus
question.body:
Iâ€™m currently migrating an application from Spring Boot 3.0 to Quarkus. While mapping the equivalent dependencies, I noticed that Quarkus provides an integration with Spring Cloud Config Server via the dependency:

 <dependency>
    <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
    <artifactId>quarkus-spring-cloud-config-client</artifactId>
</dependency>

After reading the documentation, I configured my application properties as follows:

quarkus.application.name=TEST
quarkus.spring-cloud-config.name=TEST
quarkus.spring-cloud-config.profiles[dev]=dev
quarkus.spring-cloud-config.username=user
quarkus.spring-cloud-config.password=password
quarkus.spring-cloud-config.label=dev
quarkus.spring-cloud-config.enabled=true
quarkus.spring-cloud-config.url=http://config-server-test.hn
quarkus.spring-cloud-config.fail-fast= false
quarkus.spring-cloud-config.trust-certs=false
quarkus.spring-cloud-config.discovery.enabled=true
#quarkus
quarkus.http.port=8080



quarkus.log.category."org.eclipse.microprofile.config".level=DEBUG
quarkus.datasource.devservices.enabled=false
quarkus.log.category."io.quarkus.spring.cloud.config".level=DEBUG

Despite this configuration, I keep running into the same error.

Has anyone faced this issue before, or could point me in the right direction?

Build failed due to errors [error]: Build step io.quarkus.hibernate.orm.deployment.HibernateOrmProcessor#configurationDescriptorBuilding threw an exception: io.quarkus.runtime.configuration.ConfigurationException: Unable to find datasource '' for persistence unit '': Datasource '' is not configured. To solve this, configure datasource ''. Refer to https://quarkus.io/guides/datasource for guidance.

After a while I solved this issue by adding the db-kind propertie, seems that quarkus needs to know which DB will be used.

quarkus.datasource.db-kind=oracle

question_comments.body: indeed, that is because this property is fixed at build time. All properties with a little slot in front are. quarkus.io/guides/datasource#configuration-reference

@geoand l was able to solve the issue by adding the quarkus.datasource.db-kind=oracle propertie, seems to me that for some reason quarkus needs to know which DB will be used inside the propertie files and not from the config server
What does the config in Spring Cloud Config  server look like?
